channel.title: Tufte-Jekyll
channel.description: A Jekyll theme for content-rich sites

item.title: Let's start!
item.description:
After quite some time I finally decided to build a personal page and blog. I’m planning to post technical tutorials, fun facts, and other interesting discoveries that I’m encountering in my day-to-day life.

I’m thankful to the maintainer of tufte-jekyll for the awesome theme that is used to create this website.
